column3: Arbitrary/Meaningful name of the HL7 Study Retention Policy
Minimal Study Retention Period in ISO-8601 period format PnYnMnD or PnW
Maximal Study Retention Period in ISO-8601 period format PnYnMnD or PnW
Conditions in format {SEG}-{Seq#}[.{Comp#}[.{SubComp#}]][!]={regEx}. Examples: MSH-4=FORWARD or MSH-9=ADT\^A28\^ADT_A05

column2: Start Retention Period on Study Date
column3: Indicates if retention period should be started on individual Study Dates instead on receive of the HL7 message triggering this rule.
Export expired Study/Series using the specified Exporter
Indicate to disable changes of the Expiration Date by following events.
Indicate to revoke a previous set Expiration Date.
